channel.title: Gielinor
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/mj8xmo.jpg[/img]
[size=12pt]Welcome to the Gielinor project thread.[/size][/CENTER]
Announcement: I am ~Vitiello~ from r-s.
[size=14pt]Overview:[/size] Gielinor will be based on a pking/economy server. It will not be your average pking servers where you see all the items in the shop, or a economy that allows you to start with 1m+.
Gielinor is mainly based in the f2p area, although multiple areas will be accessed such as Taverly dungeon, dagannoth kings, kalphite queen, canifis, etc.
[size=14pt]The Base:[/size] The base chosen for this project is Riotscape, due to fact that I cannot run Hyperion nor Shard Revolutions on my computer and because of the stability. All scripts(excluding eat, prayer, npc clicks and object clicks) and minigames have been removed so I can start scratch with them.
[size=14pt]Goals:[/size] My goals are no different to any other server owner. Goals such as a successful server, great community and an alive server are my goals.
Skills:
[ul][*]Cooking - 100% [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/14bnwwg.jpg[/img] [list] [*]All fish [*]Correct required levels [*]Correct burning [*]Correct Cooking [*]Correct stop burning levels [*]Correct interface 100% working [*]30x Runescape experience [/list]
[*]Crafting - 100% [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/jsixkj.jpg[/img] [list] [*]Correct required levels [*]All gems [*]Must have chisel to cut [*]Perfecting cutting [*]Interfaces working [*]30x RS xp [/list]
[*]Fishing 100% [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/el30xl.jpg[/img] [list] [*]Proper level requirements [*]Perfect fishing spots [*]Netting, big netting, baiting, etc [*]Multiple in 1 spot [*]30x RS Experience [/list]
[*]Fletching - 0%
[*]Herblore - 100% [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/nzew5l.jpg[/img] [list] [*]Correct level requirements [*]Item on item [*]30x RS Experience [*]Herbs, secondaries and vials required [*]Crushing [/list]
[*]Mining - 100% [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/nox4hu.jpg[/img] [list] [*]All picks work [*]Picks require mining levels [*]All rocks work [*]30x RS Experience [/list]
[*]Runecrafting - 100% [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/e6w2op.jpg[/img] [list] [*]Zamorak mage full 3 options [*]Abyss [*]Techniques of getting in [*]Pouches [*]Correct Required levels [*]Correct double amount levels [*]30x rs exp [/list]
[*]Slayer - 100% [list] [*]One master [*]Harder tasks depending on level [*]Able to end tasks [*]Access to shop [*]Slayer effects(npcs) [*]Items work [*]30x rs xp [/list]
[*]Smithing - 0%
[*]Thieving - 100% [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/21eugsz.jpg[/img] [list] [*]All stalls [*]100% object deleting and adding back [*]All different timers [*]Correct required levels [*]The higher level the store, the longer to respawn back [*]30x Runescape experience [/list]
[*]Woodcutting - 100% [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2vt2p36.jpg[/img] [list] [*]All axes work [*]Axes need requirements [*]All trees work [*]Correct requirements needed [*]30x RS Experience [/list]
Progress on the skills are going at a fast rate, I will continue to stay this way and have them finished in no time.
[size=14pt]Areas:[/size]
[list] [*]Lumbridge - 100% [list] [*]Spawns - 100% [*]Objects - 100% [/list]
[*]Al-Kharid - 50% [list] [*]Spawns - 100% [*]Objects - 0% [/list]
[*]Varrock - 100% [list] [*]Spawns - 100% [*]Objects - 100% [/list]
[*]Falador - 100% [list] [*]Spawns - 100% [*]Objects - 100% [/list]
[*]Draynor - 50% [list] [*]Spawns - 100% [*]Objects - 0% [/list]
[*]Port Sarim - 50% [list] [*]Spawns - 100% [*]Objects - 0% [/list]
[*]Rimmington - 50% [list] [*]Spawns - 100% [*]Objects - 0% [/list] [/list]
Like the skills, progress with the cities are at a fast rate.
[size=14pt]Minigames:[/size]
[list] [*]Pest Control - 0% [*]Mage Arena - 0% [*]Magic Training Arena - 0% [*]Barrows - 100% [list] [*]All brothers [*]All have effects(excluding torag due to the fact I have not added energy yet) [list] [*]Karil(drains agility, although agility will not be used in the server) [*]Ahrim(drains strength) [*]Dharok(lower the hp, higher his hit) [*]Verac(hits through prayer) [*]Guthan(heals himself through the damage he gives) [/list] [*]Tunnel just teleports you to chest room [*]You must kill last brother first [*]Cannot spawn more than once [*]Loot given and then teleported on surface [/list] [*]Fight Caves - 100% [list] [*]21 waves [*]1/3 of tokkul reward + fire cape [*]All npcs have effects [*]Correct Dialogues [/list] [*]Fight Pits - 0% [/list]
Minigames are being developed as we speak
[size=14pt]Bosses:[/size]
[list] [*]KBD - 100% [url=http://tinypic.com/usermedia.php?uo=f%2BydX%2FAT8aXgHDfpxZqRL4h4l5k2TGxc]http://tinypic.com/usermedia.php?uo=f%2BydX%2FAT8aXgHDfpxZqRL4h4l5k2TGxc[/url] [list] [*]All 4 breathes [list] [*]Fire Ball (no effect) [*]Shock Blaze ( drains your statistics ) [*]Icy Blast ( Freezes you for 20 seconds ) [*]Poison Breath ( Poison damage = 8 ) [/list] [*]Anti shield works with prayer, although breaths still hit [/list]
[*]Chaos Elemental - 100% [list] [*]All 3 attacks work [list] [*]Mystical Impulse ( no effect ) [*]Rejection blast ( removes your weapon if you have space) [*]Teleportation blast ( teleports you away ) [/list] [*]Correct animations [*]Correct max hit formulas [/list]
[*]Giant Mole - 100% [url=http://tinypic.com/usermedia.php?uo=8CrmpUc4lOkQlf9%2FZLcdGYh4l5k2TGxc]http://tinypic.com/usermedia.php?uo=8CrmpUc4lOkQlf9%2FZLcdGYh4l5k2TGxc[/url] [list] [*]Perfect attacking [*]if below half health, sometimes digs [*]Proper digging, I just need the emote and it is complete. [/list]
[*]Kalphite Queen - 100% http://tinypic.com/usermedia.php?uo=8CrmpUc4lOl7YdRy9Qerwoh4l5k2TGxc [list] [*]Correct Attack styles (mage and range) [*]Correct animations and gfx(just need to fix up second form) [*]2 Forms [*]First form will not respawn back until second form is dead for 2mins 10 secs. [/list]
[*]Dagannoth Kings - 100% [url=http://tinypic.com/usermedia.php?uo=f%2BydX%2FAT8aX4%2FG84%2BaYMKYh4l5k2TGxc]http://tinypic.com/usermedia.php?uo=f%2BydX%2FAT8aX4%2FG84%2BaYMKYh4l5k2TGxc[/url] [list] [*]Working Pressure Pads [*]Working Door Supports [*]All npcs have the correct attackstyle and gfx [*]All npcs have perfect max hit formulas [*]Spinolyps have their prayer draining effect [*]Spinolyps are both ranging and maging [/list] The bosses of gielinor are 100% finished.
[size=14pt]Random Events: New![/size]
[list] [*]Lost and Found - 100% [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/13yqvj5.jpg[/img] [list] [*]Message + Teleportation to Lost and Found [*]Must pull an appendage to leave [/list] [*]The River Troll - 100% [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/23rpfsx.jpg[/img] [list] [*]The lower your combat the lower the trolls combat [*]Only comes when fishing [*]Disappears when you run out of it's sight [/list] [*]Caged! - 0% [*]The Tree Spirit - 100% [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/jhrja0.jpg[/img] [list] [*]The lower your combat the lower the spirits combat [*]Only comes when woodcutting [*]Disappears when you run out of it's sight [/list] [*]The Rock Golem - 100% [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2rmpkc9.jpg[/img] [list] [*]The lower your combat the lower the golems combat [*]Only comes when mining [*]Disappears when you run out of it's sight [/list]
As more skills are developed, there will be more randoms. Pictures will come soon.
[size=14pt]Updates[/size]
January 1st, 2010 ~New year updates~ Added spawns for all of Lumbridge Started all doors in lumbridge
January 2nd, 2010 ~Updates~ Finished Lumbridge spawns Almost finished all doors for lumbridge. Lumbridge finished. Started Varrock
January 3rd, 2010 ~Updates~ Finished Varrock spawns Starting Varrock doors.
January 4th, 2010 ~Updates~ Started Falador Spawns Finished Falador Spawns Started Barbarian village spawns Finished Barbarian village spawns Started Edgeville spawns Finished Edgeville Spawns Started Port Sarim spawns Started Al-kharid spawns Finished Al-kharid spawns Started Lumbridge forest spawns Finished Lumbridge forest spawns Started Draynor spawns ~Client Updates~ Changed client side icons to 317 Repositioned Side icons to correct spots Changed teleport sprites
January 5th, 2010 ~Client Updates~ Added prayer icon for 377 prot item Added brand new bg ~Updates~ Finish Draynor spawns Finished Port Sarim spawns Started Rimmington spawns Finished Rimmington spawns Changed teleports Started Monastery Spawns Finished Monastery spawns Started Dwarf spawns Finished Dwarf spawns Adjusted the way pathfinding recieves bytes Adjusted XP rate Started Fishing Finished Fishing -Level Requirements -Fishing spots working -All fishes -Catching 2 different fish in 1 npc click -2 npc clicks working -30x rs exp
January 6th, 2010 ~Updates~ All men and women have dialogues Started Pickpocketing Finished Pickpocketing -Level Requirements -Being stunned -Forced npc chat -Stun gfx -30x rs exp Finished Varrock Doors Started Ladders Finished Ladders All general store owners have dialogues Starting stall thieving Finished stall thieving -Removing and adding of objects -Adding of item from stall -All different object spawn back timers -30x rs exp Adding all stores with dialogues and shops
January 7th, 2010 ~Updates~ Almost finished all shops and dialogues Started Cooking Finished cooking, although there is a bug =\ Taking media FIXED COOKING! OMFG! So happy =].
January 8th, 2010 ~Updates~ Placed Fishing spots. Starting dialogues for Falador bar Finished Falador bar (Rising sun) Starting adding Skill tabs
January 9th, 2010 ~No updates~
January 10th, 2010 ~Updates~ Added access to taverly dungeon Starting Taverly dungeon spawns Finish Taverly dungeon spawns Adding npc drops Finished most npc drops.
January 11th, 2010 ~Updates~ Started Runecrafting Finished Runecrafting -Zamorak mage full 3 options -Abyss -Techniques of getting in -Pouches -Correct Required levels -Correct double amount levels -30x rs exp Changed teleport strings New system for teleporting -No levels required -Runes required Started Slayer Finished Slayer -One master -Harder tasks depending on level -Able to end tasks -Access to shop -Slayer effects(npcs) -Items work -30x rs xp
January 12th, 2010 ~Updates~ Added Poisoning, 100% Added random events -Lost and Found -Thieving - Caged Didn't do alot =\
January 13th, 2010 ~Updates~ Added River troll event Started Herblore Finished Herblore -Correct level requirements -Herbs, secondaries and vials required -Crushing -30x rs xp. Started Woodcutting Finished Woodcutting -All axes work -Axes need requirements -All trees work -Correct requirements -30x rs exp
January 14th, 2010 ~Updates~ Added Tree Spirit random Started Mining Finished Mining -All picks work -Picks need requirements -All rocks work -Correct requirements -30x rs exp -Golem event added ~Forum Updates~ Added new skin Input new banner Added user groups Boards are being done shortly User group icons added Boards are finished Premium features are finished
January 15th, 2010 ~Testing, not updates today~ 4 bugs found, 3 fixed.
January 16th, 2010 Started Crafting gems Finished Crafting gems -Interface works -x amount works -All gems -Item on item works -30x rs exp
January 17th, 2010 ~Updates~ Fixed special attack glitch Shops finished Started Barbarian doors Finished Barbarian doors Started adding Skillcapes
January 18th, 2010 ~Updates~ Finished adding skillcapes Added skillcape master
January 19th, 2010 ~Updates~ Started Edgeville objects Finished Edgeville objects Npc combat has been fixed. Created double door system. Populated Slayer tower
January 20th, 2010 Started Falador doors Finished Falador doors Started Dagannoth kings! Npc aggression added, thanks Sanity.
January 21st, 2010 Finished Dagannoth Kings! -Working pressure pads -Working door supports -All npcs have the correct attackstyle and gfxes -Kings have perfect max hits -Spinolyps have there prayer draining effect -Spinolyps are both ranging and maging Started Barrows Finished Barrows -All brothers -All have effects(excluding torag due to the fact I have not added energy yet) --Karil(drains agility, although agility will not be used in the server) --Ahrim(drains strength) --Dharok(lower the hp, higher his hit) --Verac(hits through prayer) --Guthan(heals himself through the damage he gives) -Tunnel just teleports you to chest room -You must kill last brother first -Cannot spawn more than once -Loot given and then teleported on surface Started KBD Finished KBD -All breaths --Fire Ball (no effect) --Shock Blaze ( decreases your statistics by 1) --Icy Blast (stop your from moving for 20 seconds) --Poison breath (8 poison damage) -Anti shield works with prayer, although breaths still hit
January 22nd, 2010 Started Fightcaves
January 23rd, 2010 Almost finished fight caves Started Giant Mole Finished Giant mole -If below half health sometime's digs -Can sell mole claws to wyson the farmer
January 24th, 2010 Added some bug fixes Added npc drops Fixed up giant mole's digging, gfx is now completed Started Chaos Elemental Finished Chaos Elemental -All 3 attacks --Mystical impulse( no effect ) --Rejection blast ( takes away your weapon if you have 1 or more spaces in invent) --Teleportation blast ( teleports you away) -Hits through prayer -Correct animations -Correct max hit formulas
January 25th, 2010 Added deep wildy lever in falador Added full lever teleports Added web cutting Added wilderness gates Added npc poisoning Started first Challenge - The Cook's Challenge
January 26th, 2010 Started last boss - Kalphite Queen! Finished Kalphite Queen -2 attacks (mage and range) -Minions aggressive -Changes form -First form will only respawn after the second is killed -Correct animations and gfx -Bugs: --Not multi area (not really a bug, just haven't added) --Second forms projectiles Restarting on fight caves again
January 27th, 2010 Finished fight caves
[center]Support this project?[/center] Please put one of these graphics in your signature!
[center][IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/mj8xmo.jpg[/img] - Thank you Josh
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/k2dztj.jpg[/img] - Thank you Josh
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/a4on0l.jpg[/img][/center]
You may also post your own GFX to be displayed on the thread.[/list][/list][/ul]

item.title: Gielinor
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

Just tested out the server for an hour or so, works great
There certainly is room for improvement, especially on the skills (woodcutting can be better. You can’t wc if you have 2 axes of different levels in your inventory. Also sometimes it won’t start the woodcutting when clicking a tree).

But overall, it works great.

Read full topic
